data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malamel, Jobi J., Sankaran, Pradeep M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2015): First record of the jumping spider genus Bavia Simon, 1877 from India, with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 4007 (4): 596-599, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.4.11
